trans-unit.source: An instance of VoiceChangeEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Tworzone jest wystąpienie VoiceChangeEventArgs, kiedy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>obiekt zgłasza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the identity of the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Można uzyskać tożsamości nowej <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, dostępu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>Właściwości programu obsługi dla zdarzenia.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Możesz zmienić głos używany przez <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>ze wszystkimi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>w <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metody lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>w <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>lub <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"></xref> object of the new voice.
The Voice property gets the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event is raised.
Returns information that describes and identifies the new voice.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca informacje, które opisano i identyfikuje nowy głos.
